ModName.Chinese: 帕洛玛的故事 - Enable DLC11 Story Quest
ModName.English: Paloma's Story - Enable DLC11 Story Quest
ModName.French: Histoire de Paloma - Enable DLC11 Story Quest
ModName.German: Palomas Geschichte - Enable DLC11 Story Quest
ModName.Italian: La storia di Paloma - Enable DLC11 Story Quest
ModName.Japanese: パロマの物語 - Enable DLC11 Story Quest
ModName.Korean: 팔로마의 이야기 - Enable DLC11 Story Quest
ModName.Polish: Historia Palomy - Enable DLC11 Story Quest
ModName.Russian: История Паломы - Enable DLC11 Story Quest

Description.English: Enables the disabled DLC11 Story Questline 'Paloma's Story' around Paloma and Airships in Sandbox Mode (singleplayer only, except you also install my Story in Coop mod)
Description.German: Aktiviert die deaktivierte DLC11 Story Questline 'Palomas Geschichte' über Paloma und Luftschiffe im Sandbox Modus (nur Singpleplayer, außer mein mod Story in Coop ist auch aktiv)
